allProjects.title: MindEase
allProjects.description: MindEase is a modern Next.js web application that serves as a digital wellness companion for mental health support, featuring mymentalhealthpal AI therapist, guided mindfulness activities, and personal wellness tracking dashboards. The platform integrates an AI-powered therapist for intelligent mental health guidance along with therapeutic tools like CBT exercises, breathing pacers, and mood gardens to help users on their mental wellness journey.
allProjects.tech: figma, next-js, claude max, cohere, supabase

allProjects.title: ASL Recognition
allProjects.description: This ASL detection model is built on MobileNetV2, pretrained on ImageNet and fine-tuned on an ASL dataset, optimized for mobile performance, making it ideal for Snap AR.

allProjects.title: Glossy Deals
allProjects.description: A price-comparison engine for Korean skincare, aggregating 20,000+ products from 5 major retailers using Puppeteer scrapers.

allProjects.title: ResuPro
allProjects.description: ResuPro creates stunning professional resum√©s and cover letters in seconds using AI.
